GV05chup___u:1000: tad dhaitad ghora āṅgirasaḥ kṛṣṇāya devakīputrāyoktvovāca /

GV05chup___u:1008: devaṃ devatrā sūryam aganma jyotir uttamam iti jyotir uttamam iti // ChUp_3,17.7 //
GV05chup___u:1013: ity ubhayam ādiṣṭaṃ bhavaty adhyātmaṃ cādhidaivataṃ ca // ChUp_3,18.1 //
GV05chup___u:1015: vāk pādaḥ prāṇaḥ pādaś cakṣuḥ pādaḥ śrotraṃ pādaḥ /
GV05chup___u:1018: agniḥ pādo vāyuḥ pāda ādityaḥ pādo diśaḥ pādaḥ /
GV05chup___u:1019: ity ubhayam evādiṣṭaṃ bhavaty adhyātmaṃ cādhidaivataṃ ca // ChUp_3,18.2 //
GV05chup___u:1021: so 'gninā jyotiṣā bhāti ca tapati ca /
GV05chup___u:1022: bhāti ca tapati ca kīrtyā yaśasā brahmavarcasena ya evaṃ veda // ChUp_3,18.3 //
GV05chup___u:1024: sa vāyunā jyotiṣā bhāti ca tapati ca /
GV05chup___u:1025: bhāti ca tapati ca kīrtyā yaśasā brahmavarcasena ya evaṃ veda // ChUp_3,18.4 //
GV05chup___u:1027: sa ādityena jyotiṣā bhāti ca tapati ca /
GV05chup___u:1028: bhāti ca tapati ca kīrtyā yaśasā brahmavarcasena ya evaṃ veda // ChUp_3,18.5 //
GV05chup___u:1030: sa digbhir jyotiṣā bhāti ca tapati ca /
GV05chup___u:1031: bhāti ca tapati ca kīrtyā yaśasā brahmavarcasena ya evaṃ veda ya evaṃ veda // ChUp_3,18.6 //
GV05chup___u:1040: te āṇḍakapāle rajataṃ ca suvarṇaṃ cābhavatām // ChUp_3,19.1 //
GV05chup___u:1047: yad vāsteyam udakaṃ sa samudraḥ // ChUp_3,19.2 //
GV05chup___u:1048: atha yat tad ajāyata so 'sāv ādityaḥ /
GV05chup___u:1049: taṃ jāyamānaṃ ghoṣā ulūlavo 'nūdatiṣṭhant sarvāṇi ca bhūtāni sarve ca kāmāḥ /
GV05chup___u:1050: tasmāt tasyodayaṃ prati pratyāyanaṃ prati ghoṣā ulūlavo 'nūttiṣṭhanti sarvāṇi ca bhūtāni sarve ca kāmāḥ // ChUp_3,19.3 //
GV05chup___u:1051: sa ya etam evaṃ vidvān ādityaṃ brahmety upāste /
GV05chup___u:1052: abhyāśo ha yad enaṃ sādhavo ghoṣā ā ca gaccheyur upa ca nimreḍeran nimreḍeran // ChUp_3,19.4 //
GV05chup___u:1053: jānaśrutir ha pautrāyaṇaḥ śraddhādeyo bahudāyī bahupākya āsa /
GV05chup___u:1054: sa ha sarvata āvasathān māpayāṃ cakre sarvata eva me 'nnam atsyantīti // ChUp_4,1.1 //
GV05chup___u:1057: ho ho 'yi bhallākṣa bhallākṣa jānaśruteḥ pautrāyaṇasya samaṃ divā jyotir ātataṃ tan mā prasāṅkṣīs tat tvāṃ mā pradhākṣīr iti // ChUp_4,1.2 //
GV05chup___u:1058: tam u ha paraḥ pratyuvāca kam v ara enam etat santaṃ sayugvānam iva raikvam āttha iti /
GV05chup___u:1059: yo nu kathaṃ sayugvā raikva iti // ChUp_4,1.3 //
GV05chup___u:1060: yathā kṛtāya vijitāyādhareyāḥ saṃyanty evam enaṃ sarvaṃ tad abhisameti yat kiṃca prajāḥ sādhu kurvanti /
GV05chup___u:1061: yas tad veda yat sa veda sa mayaitad ukta iti // ChUp_4,1.4 //
GV05chup___u:1062: tad u ha jānaśrutiḥ pautrāyaṇa upaśuśrāva /
GV05chup___u:1063: sa ha saṃjihāna eva kṣattāram uvācāṅgāre ha sayugvānam iva raikvam āttheti /
GV05chup___u:1064: yo nu kathaṃ sayugvā raikva iti // ChUp_4,1.5 //
GV05chup___u:1065: yathā kṛtāya vijitāyādhareyāḥ saṃyanty evam enaṃ sarvaṃ tad abhisameti yat kiṃca prajāḥ sādhu kurvanti /
GV05chup___u:1066: yas tad veda yat sa veda sa mayaitad ukta iti // ChUp_4,1.6 //
GV05chup___u:1067: sa ha kṣattānviṣya nāvidam iti pratyeyāya /
GV05chup___u:1068: taṃ hovāca yatrāre brāhmaṇasyānveṣaṇā tad enam arccheti // ChUp_4,1.7 //
GV05chup___u:1070: taṃ hābhyuvāda tvaṃ nu bhagavaḥ sayugvā raikva iti /
GV05chup___u:1071: ahaṃ hy arā 3 iti ha pratijajñe /
GV05chup___u:1072: sa ha kṣattāvidam iti pratyeyāya // ChUp_4,1.8 //
GV05chup___u:1073: tad u ha jānaśrutiḥ pautrāyaṇaḥ ṣaṭ śatāni gavāṃ niṣkam aśvatarīrathaṃ tad ādāya praticakrame /
GV05chup___u:1075: raikvemāni ṣaṭ śatāni gavām ayaṃ niṣko 'yam aśvatarīrathaḥ /
GV05chup___u:1076: anu ma etāṃ bhagavo devatāṃ śādhi yāṃ devatām upāssa iti // ChUp_4,2.2 //
GV05chup___u:1077: tam u ha paraḥ pratyuvācāha hāretvā śūdra tavaiva saha gobhir astv iti /
GV05chup___u:1078: tad u ha punar eva jānaśrutiḥ pautrāyaṇaḥ sahasraṃ gavāṃ niṣkam aśvatarīrathaṃ duhitaraṃ tad ādāya praticakrame // ChUp_4,2.3 //
GV05chup___u:1080: raikvedaṃ sahasraṃ gavām ayaṃ niṣko 'yam aśvatarīratha iyaṃ jāyāyaṃ grāmo yasminn āsse 'nv eva mā bhagavaḥ śādhīti // ChUp_4,2.4 //
GV05chup___u:1081: tasyā ha mukham upodgṛhṇann uvācājahāremāḥ śūdrānenaiva mukhenālāpayiṣyathā iti /
GV05chup___u:1082: te haite raikvaparṇā nāma mahāvṛṣeṣu yatrāsmā uvāsa /
GV05chup___u:1085: yadā vā agnir udvāyati vāyum evāpyeti /
GV05chup___u:1087: yadā candro 'stam eti vāyum evāpyeti // ChUp_4,3.1 //
GV05chup___u:1093: sa yadā svapiti prāṇam eva vāg apy eti /
GV05chup___u:1097: prāṇo hy evaitān sarvān saṃvṛṅkta iti // ChUp_4,3.3 //
GV05chup___u:1099: vāyur eva deveṣu prāṇaḥ prāṇeṣu // ChUp_4,3.4 //
GV05chup___u:1100: atha ha śaunakaṃ ca kāpeyam abhipratāriṇaṃ ca kākṣaseniṃ pariviṣyamāṇau brahmacārī bibhikṣe /
GV05chup___u:1101: tasmā u ha na dadatuḥ // ChUp_4,3.5 //
GV05chup___u:1103: mahātmanaś caturo deva ekaḥ kaḥ sa jagāra bhuvanasya gopāḥ /
GV05chup___u:1104: taṃ kāpeya nābhipaśyanti martyā abhipratārin bahudhā vasantam /
GV05chup___u:1105: yasmai vā etad annaṃ tasmā etan na dattam iti // ChUp_4,3.6 //
GV05chup___u:1106: tad u ha śaunakaḥ kāpeyaḥ pratimanvānaḥ pratyeyāya /
GV05chup___u:1107: ātmā devānāṃ janitā prajānāṃ hiraṅyadaṃṣṭro babhaso 'nasūriḥ /
GV05chup___u:1108: mahāntam asya mahimānam āhur anadyamāno yad anannam atti /
GV05chup___u:1109: iti vai vayam brahmacārin nedam upāsmahe dattāsmai bhikṣām iti // ChUp_4,3.7 //
GV05chup___u:1111: te vā ete pañcānye pañcānye daśa santas tat kṛtam /
GV05chup___u:1112: tasmāt sarvāsu dikṣv annam eva daśa kṛtam /
GV05chup___u:1115: sarvam asya idaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ bhavaty annādo bhavati ya evaṃ veda ya evaṃ veda // ChUp_4,3.8 //
GV05chup___u:1116: satyakāmo ha jābālo jabālāṃ mātaram āmantrayāṃ cakre /
GV05chup___u:1117: brahmacaryaṃ bhavati vivatsyāmi kiṃgotro nv aham asmīti // ChUp_4,4.1 //
GV05chup___u:1119: nāham etad veda tāta yadgotras tvam asi /
GV05chup___u:1120: bahv aham carantī paricāriṇī yauvane tvām alabhe /
GV05chup___u:1121: sāham etan na veda yadgotras tvam asi /
GV05chup___u:1124: sa satyakāma eva jābālo bruvīthā iti // ChUp_4,4.2 //
GV05chup___u:1130: nāham etad veda bho yadgotro 'ham asmi /
GV05chup___u:1132: sā mā pratyabravīd bahv aham carantī paricariṇī yauvane tvām alabhe /
GV05chup___u:1133: sāham etan na veda yadgotras tvam asi /
GV05chup___u:1136: so 'haṃ satyakāmo jābālo 'smi bho iti // ChUp_4,4.4 //
GV05chup___u:1140: upa tvā neṣye na satyād agā iti /
GV05chup___u:1141: tam upanīya kṛśānām abalānāṃ catuḥśatā gā nirākṛtya uvācemāḥ somyānusaṃvrajeti /
GV05chup___u:1150: brahmaṇaś ca te pādaṃ bravāṇi iti /
GV05chup___u:1157: eṣa vai somya catuṣkalaḥ pādo brahmaṇaḥ prakāśavān nāma // ChUp_4,5.2 //
GV05chup___u:1158: sa ya etam evaṃ vidvāṃś catuṣkalaṃ pādaṃ brahmaṇaḥ prakāśavān ity upāste prakāśavān asmiṃl loke bhavati /
GV05chup___u:1159: prakāśavato ha lokāñ jayati ya etam evaṃ vidvāṃś catuṣkalaṃ pādaṃ brahmaṇaḥ prakāśavān ity upāste // ChUp_4,5.3 //
GV05chup___u:1161: sa ha śvo bhūte gā abhiprasthāpayāṃ cakāra /
GV05chup___u:1162: tā yatrābhisāyaṃ babhūvus tatrāgnim upasamādhāya gā uparudhya samidham ādhāya paścād agneḥ prāṅ upopaviveśa // ChUp_4,6.1 //
GV05chup___u:1172: eṣa vai somya catuṣkalaḥ pādo brahmaṇo 'nantavān nāma // ChUp_4,6.3 //
GV05chup___u:1173: sa ya etam evaṃ vidvāṃś catuṣkalaṃ pādaṃ brahmaṇo 'nantavān ity upāste 'nantavān asmiṃl loke bhavati /
GV05chup___u:1174: anantavato ha lokāñ jayati ya etam evaṃ vidvāṃś catuṣkalaṃ pādaṃ brahmaṇo 'nantavān ity upāste // ChUp_4,6.4 //
GV05chup___u:1182: eṣa vai somya catuṣkalaḥ pādo brahmaṇo jyotiṣmān nāma // ChUp_4,7.3 //
GV05chup___u:1183: sa ya etam evaṃ vidvāṃś catuṣkalaṃ pādaṃ brahmaṇo jyotiṣmān ity upāste jyotiṣmān asmiṃl loke bhavati /
GV05chup___u:1184: jyotiṣmato ha lokāñ jayati ya etam evaṃ vidvāṃś catuṣkalaṃ pādaṃ brahmaṇo jyotiṣmān ity upāste // ChUp_4,7.4 //
GV05chup___u:1186: sa ha śvo bhūte gā abhiprasthāpayāṃ cakāra /
GV05chup___u:1187: tā yatrābhisāyaṃ babhūvus tatrāgnim upasamādhāya gā uparudhya samidham ādhāya paścād agneḥ prāṅ upopaviveśa // ChUp_4,8.1 //
GV05chup___u:1197: eṣa vai somya catuṣkalaḥ pādo brahmaṇa āyatanavān nāma // ChUp_4,8.3 //
GV05chup___u:1198: sa ya etam evaṃ vidvāṃś catuṣkalaṃ pādaṃ brahmaṇa āyatanavān ity upāsta āyatanavān asmiṃl loke bhavati /
GV05chup___u:1199: āyatanavato ha lokāñ jayati ya etam evaṃ vidvāṃś catuṣkalaṃ pādaṃ brahmaṇa āyatanavān ity upāste // ChUp_4,8.4 //
GV05chup___u:1206: bhagavāṃs tv eva me kāme brūyāt // ChUp_4,9.2 //
GV05chup___u:1207: śrutaṃ hy eva me bhagavaddṛśebhya ācāryād dhaiva vidyā viditā sādhiṣṭhaṃ prāpatīti /
GV05chup___u:1209: atra ha na kiṃcana vīyāyeti vīyāyeti // ChUp_4,9.3 //
GV05chup___u:1210: upakosalo ha vai kāmalāyanaḥ satyakāme jābāle brahmacāryam uvāsa /
GV05chup___u:1211: tasya ha dvādaśa vārṣāny agnīn paricacāra /
GV05chup___u:1212: sa ha smānyān antevāsinaḥ samāvartayaṃs taṃ ha smaiva na samāvartayati // ChUp_4,10.1 //
GV05chup___u:1213: taṃ jāyovāca tapto brahmacārī kuśalam agnīn paricacārīt /
GV05chup___u:1220: sa ha uvāca bahava ime 'smin puruṣe kāmā nānātyāyāḥ /
GV05chup___u:1226: prāṇo brahma kaṃ brahma khaṃ brahmeti // ChUp_4,10.4 //
GV05chup___u:1229: kaṃ ca tu khaṃ ca na vijānāmīti /
GV05chup___u:1231: yad vāva kaṃ tad eva kham /
GV05chup___u:1232: yad eva khaṃ tad eva kam iti /
GV05chup___u:1233: prāṇaṃ ca hāsmai tad ākāśaṃ cocuḥ // ChUp_4,10.5 //
GV05chup___u:1234: atha hainaṃ gārhapatyo 'nuśaśāsa pṛthivy agnir annam āditya iti /
GV05chup___u:1235: ya eṣa āditye puruṣo dṛśyate so 'ham asmi sa eva aham asmi iti // ChUp_4,11.1 //
GV05chup___u:1236: sa ya etam evaṃ vidvān upāste /
GV05chup___u:1242: upa vayaṃ taṃ bhuñjāmo 'smiṃś ca loke 'muṣmiṃś ca /
GV05chup___u:1243: ya etam evaṃ vidvān upāste // ChUp_4,11.2 //
GV05chup___u:1244: atha ha enam anvāhāryapacano 'nuśaśāsa āpo diśo nakṣatrāṇi candramā iti /
GV05chup___u:1245: ya eṣa candramasi puruṣo dṛṣyate so 'ham asmi sa eva aham asmi iti // ChUp_4,12.1 //
GV05chup___u:1246: sa ya etam evaṃ vidvān upāste /
GV05chup___u:1252: upa vayaṃ taṃ bhuñjāmo 'smiṃś ca loke 'muṣmiṃś ca /
GV05chup___u:1253: ya etam evaṃ vidvān upāste // ChUp_4,12.2 //
GV05chup___u:1254: atha hainam āhavanīyo 'nuśaśāsa prāṇa ākāśo dyaur vidyud iti /
GV05chup___u:1255: ya eṣa vidyuti puruṣo dṛśyate so 'ham asmi sa evāham asmīti // ChUp_4,13.1 //
GV05chup___u:1256: sa ya etam evaṃ vidvān upāste /
GV05chup___u:1262: upa vayaṃ taṃ bhuñjāmo 'smiṃś ca loke 'muṣmiṃś ca /
GV05chup___u:1263: ya etam evaṃ vidvān upāste // ChUp_4,13.2 //
GV05chup___u:1272: ko nu mānuśiśyād bho itīhāpeva nihnute /
GV05chup___u:1273: ime nūnam īdṛśā anyādṛśā itīhāgnīn abhyūde /
GV05chup___u:1274: kiṃ nu somya kila te 'vocann iti // ChUp_4,14.2 //
GV05chup___u:1277: ahaṃ tu te tad vakṣyāmi yathā puṣkarapalāśa āpo na śliṣyanta evam evaṃvidi pāpaṃ karma na śliṣyata iti /
GV05chup___u:1280: ya eṣo 'kṣiṇi puruṣo dṛśyata eṣa ātmeti hovāca /
GV05chup___u:1282: tad yady apy asmin sarpir vodakaṃ vā siñcati vartmanī eva gacchati // ChUp_4,15.1 //
GV05chup___u:1285: sarvāṇy enaṃ vāmāny abhisaṃyanti ya evaṃ veda // ChUp_4,15.2 //
GV05chup___u:1288: sarvāṇi vāmāni nayati ya evaṃ veda // ChUp_4,15.3 //
GV05chup___u:1291: sarveṣu lokeṣu bhāti ya evaṃ veda // ChUp_4,15.4 //
GV05chup___u:1292: atha yad u caivāsmiñ chavyaṃ kurvanti yadi ca nārciṣam evābhisaṃbhavanti /
GV05chup___u:1295: āpūryamāṇapakṣād yān ṣaḍ udaṅṅ eti māsāṃs tān /
GV05chup___u:1303: etena pratipadyamānā imaṃ mānavam āvartaṃ nāvartante nāvartante // ChUp_4,15.5 //
GV05chup___u:1304: eṣa ha vai yajño yo 'yaṃ pavate /
GV05chup___u:1305: eṣa ha yann idaṃ sarvaṃ punāti /
GV05chup___u:1306: yad eṣa yann idaṃ sarvaṃ punāti /
GV05chup___u:1308: tasya manaś ca vāk ca vartanī // ChUp_4,16.1 //
GV05chup___u:1311: sa yatropākṛte prātaranuvāke purā paridhānīyāyā brahmā vyavavadati // ChUp_4,16.2 //
GV05chup___u:1314: sa yathaikapād vrajan ratho vaikena cakreṇa vartamāno riṣyaty evam asya yajño riṣyati /
GV05chup___u:1317: atha yatra upākṛte prātaranuvāke na purā paridhānīyāyā brahmā vyavavadaty ubhe eva vartanī saṃskurvanti /
GV05chup___u:1319: sa yathobhayapād vrajan ratho vobhābhyāṃ cakrābhyāṃ vartamānaḥ pratitiṣṭhaty evam asya yajñaḥ pratitiṣṭhati yajñaṃ pratitiṣṭhantaṃ yajamāno 'nu pratitiṣṭhati /
GV05chup___u:1336: tad yady ṛkto riṣyed bhūḥ svāheti gārhapatye juhuyāt /
GV05chup___u:1337: ṛcām eva tadrasenarcāṃ vīryeṇarcāṃ yajñasya viriṣṭaṃ saṃdadhāti // ChUp_4,17.4 //
GV05chup___u:1338: atha yadi yajuṣṭo riṣyed bhuvaḥ svāheti dakṣiṇāgnau juhuyāt /
GV05chup___u:1339: yajuṣām eva tadrasena yajuṣāṃ vīryeṇa yajuṣāṃ yajñasya viriṣṭaṃ saṃdadhāti // ChUp_4,17.5 //
GV05chup___u:1340: atha yadi sāmato riṣyet svaḥ svāhety āhavanīye juhuyāt /
GV05chup___u:1341: sāmnām eva tadrasena sāmnāṃ vīryeṇa sāmnāṃ yajñasya viriṣṭaṃ saṃdadhāti // ChUp_4,17.6 //
GV05chup___u:1343: suvarṇena rajataṃ rajatena trapu trapuṇā sīsaṃ sīsena lohaṃ lohena dāru dāru carmaṇā // ChUp_4,17.7 //
GV05chup___u:1344: evam eṣāṃ lokānām āsāṃ devatānām asyās trayyā vidyāyā vīryeṇa yajñasya viriṣṭaṃ saṃdadhāti /
GV05chup___u:1345: bheṣajakṛto ha vā eṣa yajño yatraivaṃvid brahmā bhavati // ChUp_4,17.8 //
GV05chup___u:1346: eṣa ha vā udakpravaṇo yajño yatraivaṃvid brahmā bhavati /
GV05chup___u:1347: evaṃvidaṃ ha vā eṣā brahmāṇam anu gāthā /
GV05chup___u:1348: yato yata āvartate tat tad gacchati // ChUp_4,17.9 //
GV05chup___u:1351: evaṃvid dha vai brahmā yajñaṃ yajamānaṃ sarvāṃś cartvijo 'bhirakṣati /
GV05chup___u:1352: tasmād evaṃvidam eva brahmāṇaṃ kurvīta nānevaṃvidaṃ nānevaṃvidam // ChUp_4,17.10 //
GV05chup___u:1353: yo ha vai jyeṣṭhaṃ ca śreṣṭhaṃ ca veda jyeṣṭhaś ca ha vai śreṣṭhaś ca bhavati /
GV05chup___u:1354: prāṇo vāva jyeṣṭhaś ca śreṣṭhaś ca // ChUp_5,1.1 //
GV05chup___u:1355: yo ha vai vasiṣṭhaṃ veda vasiṣṭho ha svānāṃ bhavati /
GV05chup___u:1357: yo ha vai pratiṣṭhāṃ veda prati ha tiṣṭhaty asmiṃś ca loke 'muṣmiṃś ca /
GV05chup___u:1359: yo ha vai saṃpadaṃ veda saṃ hāsmai kāmāḥ padyante daivāś ca mānuṣāś ca /
GV05chup___u:1361: yo ha vā āyatanaṃ vedāyatanaṃ ha svānāṃ bhavati /
GV05chup___u:1364: ahaṃ śreyān asmy ahaṃ śreyān asmīti // ChUp_5,1.6 //
GV05chup___u:1365: te ha prāṇāḥ prajāpatiṃ pitaram etyocuḥ bhagavan ko naḥ śreṣṭha iti /

GV05chup___u:1699: sa ha dvādaśavarṣa upetya caturviṃśativarṣaḥ sarvān vedān adhītya mahāmanā anūcānamānī stabdha eyāya /

GV05chup___u:2100: tasmād yady api daśa rātrīr nāśnīyāt /
GV05chup___u:2103: athānnasyāye draṣṭā bhavati śrotā bhavati mantā bhavati boddhā bhavati kartā bhavati vijñātā bhavati /
GV05chup___u:2107: yāvad annasya gataṃ tatrāsya yathākāmacāro bhavati yo 'nnaṃ brahmety upāste /
GV05chup___u:2110: tan me bhagavān bravītv iti // ChUp_7,9.2 //
GV05chup___u:2112: tasmād yadā suvṛṣṭir na bhavati vyādhīyante prāṇā annaṃ kanīyo bhaviṣyatīti /
GV05chup___u:2113: atha yadā suvṛṣṭir bhavaty ānandinaḥ prāṇā bhavanty annaṃ bahu bhaviṣyatīti /
GV05chup___u:2114: āpa evemā mūrtā yeyaṃ pṛthivī yad antarikṣaṃ yad dyaur yat parvatā yad devamanuṣyā yat paśavaś ca vayāṃsi ca tṛṇavanaspatayaḥ śvāpadāny ākīṭapataṅgapipīlakam /
GV05chup___u:2119: yāvad apāṃ gataṃ tatrāsya yathākāmacāro bhavati yo 'po brahmety upāste /
GV05chup___u:2122: tan me bhagavān bravītv iti // ChUp_7,10.2 //
GV05chup___u:2124: tad vā etad vāyum āgṛhyākāśam abhitapati tadāhur niśocati nitapati varṣiṣyati vā iti /
GV05chup___u:2126: tad etad ūrdhvābhiś ca tiraścībhiś ca vidyudbhir āhrādāś caranti tasmād āhur vidyotate stanayati varṣiṣyati vā iti /
GV05chup___u:2130: tejasvī vai sa tejasvato lokān bhāsvato 'pahatatamaskān abhisidhyati /
GV05chup___u:2131: yāvat tejaso gataṃ tatrāsya yathākāmacāro bhavati yas tejo brahmety upāste /
GV05chup___u:2134: tan me bhagavān bravītv iti // ChUp_7,11.2 //
GV05chup___u:2136: ākāśe vai sūryācandramasāv ubhau vidyun nakṣatrāṇy agniḥ /
GV05chup___u:2146: ākāśavato vai sa lokān prakāśavato 'saṃbādhān urugāyavato 'bhisidhyati /
GV05chup___u:2147: yāvad ākāśasya gataṃ tatrāsya yathākāmacāro bhavati ya ākāśaṃ brahmety upāste /
GV05chup___u:2150: tan me bhagavān bravītv iti // ChUp_7,12.2 //
GV05chup___u:2152: tasmād yady api bahava āsīrann a smaranto naiva te kaṃcana śṛṇuyur na manvīran na vijānīran /
GV05chup___u:2153: yadā vāva te smareyur atha śṛṇuyur atha manvīrann atha vijānīran /
GV05chup___u:2154: smareṇa vai putrān vijānāti smareṇa paśūn /
GV05chup___u:2157: yāvat smarasya gataṃ tatrāsya yathākāmacāro bhavati yaḥ smaraṃ brahmety upāste /
GV05chup___u:2160: tan me bhagavān bravītv iti // ChUp_7,13.2 //
GV05chup___u:2162: āśeddho vai smaro mantrān adhīte karmāṇi kurute putrāṃś ca paśūṃś cecchata imaṃ ca lokaṃ amuṃ cecchate /
GV05chup___u:2167: yāvad āśāyā gataṃ tatrāsya yathākāmacāro bhavati ya āśāṃ brahmety upāste /
GV05chup___u:2170: tan me bhagavān bravītv iti // ChUp_7,14.2 //
GV05chup___u:2172: yathā vā arā nābhau samarpitā evam asmin prāṇe sarvaṃ samarpitam /
GV05chup___u:2182: sa yadi pitaraṃ vā mātaraṃ vā bhrātaraṃ vā svasāraṃ vācāryaṃ vā brāhmaṇaṃ vā kiṃcid bhṛśam iva pratyāha /
GV05chup___u:2184: pitṛhā vai tvam asi mātṛhā vai tvam asi bhrātṛhā vai tvam asi svasṛhā vai tvam asy ācāryahā vai tvam asi brāhmaṇahā vai tvam asīti // ChUp_7,15.2 //
GV05chup___u:2185: atha yady apy enān utkrāntaprāṇāñ chūlena samāsaṃ vyatiṣaṃdahet /
GV05chup___u:2186: naivainaṃ brūyuḥ pitṛhāsīti na mātṛhāsīti na bhrātṛhāsīti na svasṛhāsīti nācāryahāsīti na brāhmaṇahāsīti // ChUp_7,15.3 //
GV05chup___u:2188: sa vā eṣa evaṃ paśyann evaṃ manvāna evaṃ vijānann ativādī bhavati /
GV05chup___u:2192: eṣa tu vā ativadati yaḥ satyenātivadati /
GV05chup___u:2196: yadā vai vijānāty atha satyaṃ vadati /
GV05chup___u:2231: yatra nānyat paśyati nānyac chṛṇoti nānyad vijānāti sa bhūmā /
GV05chup___u:2232: atha yatrānyat paśyaty anyac chṛṇoty anyad vijānāti tad alpam /
GV05chup___u:2236: sve mahimni yadi vā na mahimnīti // ChUp_7,24.1 //
GV05chup___u:2237: go 'śvam iha mahimety ācakṣate hastihiraṇyaṃ dāsabhāryaṃ kṣetrāṇy āyatanānīti /
GV05chup___u:2240: anyo hy anyasmin pratiṣṭhita iti // ChUp_7,24.2 //
GV05chup___u:2241: sa evādhastāt sa upariṣṭāt sa paścāt sa purastāt sa dakṣiṇataḥ sa uttarataḥ /
GV05chup___u:2244: aham evādhastād aham upariṣṭād ahaṃ paścād ahaṃ purastād ahaṃ dakṣiṇato 'ham uttarato 'ham evedaṃ sarvam iti // ChUp_7,25.1 //
GV05chup___u:2246: ātmaivādhastād ātmopariṣṭād ātmā paścād ātmā purastād ātmā dakṣiṇata ātmottarata ātmaivedaṃ sarvam iti /
GV05chup___u:2247: sa vā eṣa evaṃ paśyann evaṃ manvāna evaṃ vijānann ātmaratir ātmakrīḍa ātmamithuna ātmānandaḥ sa svarāḍ bhavati /
GV05chup___u:2249: atha ye 'nyathāto vidur anyarājānas te kṣayyalokā bhavanti /
GV05chup___u:2250: teṣāṃ sarveṣu lokeṣv akāmacāro bhavati // ChUp_7,25.2 //
GV05chup___u:2251_0: tasya ha vā etasyaivaṃ paśyata evaṃ manvānasyaivaṃ vijānata ātmataḥ prāṇa ātmata
GV05chup___u:2251_1: āśātmataḥ smara ātmata ākāśa ātmatas teja ātmata āpa ātmata āvirbhāvatirobhāvāv ātmato
GV05chup___u:2251_2: 'nnam ātmato balam ātmato vijñānam ātmato dhyānam ātmataś cittam ātmataḥ saṃkalpa
GV05chup___u:2251_3: ātmato mana ātmato vāg ātmato nāmātmato mantrā ātmataḥ karmāṇy ātmata evedaṃ sarvam
GV05chup___u:2253: na paśyo mṛtyuṃ paśyati na rogaṃ nota duḥkhatām /
GV05chup___u:2254: sarvaṃ ha paśyaḥ paśyati sarvam āpnoti sarvaśaḥ /
GV05chup___u:2256: sa ekadhā bhavati tridhā bhavati pañcadhā /
GV05chup___u:2257: saptadhā navadhā caiva punaś caikādaśa smṛtaḥ /
GV05chup___u:2258: śataṃ ca daśa caikaś ca sahasrāṇi ca viṃśatiḥ /
GV05chup___u:2262: tasmai mṛditakaṣāyāya tamasas pāraṃ darśayati bhagavān sanatkumāraḥ /
GV05chup___u:2264: atha yad idam asmin brahmapure daharaṃ puṇḍarīkaṃ veśma daharo 'sminn antarākāsaḥ /
GV05chup___u:2265: tasmin yad antas tad anveṣṭavyaṃ tad vāva vijijñāsitavyam iti // ChUp_8,1.1 //
GV05chup___u:2266: taṃ ced brūyur yad idam asmin brahmapure daharaṃ puṇḍarīkaṃ veśma daharo 'sminn antarākāśaḥ kiṃ tad atra vidyate yad anveṣṭavyaṃ yad vāva vijijñāsitavyam iti /
GV05chup___u:2268: yāvān vā ayam ākāśas tāvān eṣo 'ntarhṛdaya ākāśaḥ /
GV05chup___u:2270: ubhāv agniś ca vāyuś ca sūryācandramasāv ubhau vidyun nakṣatrāṇi /
GV05chup___u:2271: yac cāsyehāsti yac ca nāsti sarvaṃ tad asmin samāhitam iti // ChUp_8,1.3 //
GV05chup___u:2272: taṃ ced brūyur asmiṃś cedaṃ brahmapure sarvaṃ samāhitaṃ sarvāṇi ca bhūtāni sarve ca kāmā yad enaj jarā vāpnoti pradhvaṃsate vā kiṃ tato 'tiśiṣyata iti // ChUp_8,1.4 //
GV05chup___u:2274: nāsya jarayaitaj jīryati na vadhenāsya hanyate /
GV05chup___u:2275: etat satyaṃ brahmapuram asmin kāmāḥ samāhitāḥ /
GV05chup___u:2276: eṣa ātmāpahatapāpmā vijaro vimṛtyur viśoko vijighatso 'pipāsaḥ satyakāmaḥ satyasaṃkalpaḥ /
GV05chup___u:2277: yathā hy eveha prajā anvāviśanti yathānuśāsanam /
GV05chup___u:2278: yaṃ yam antam abhikāmā bhavanti yaṃ janapadaṃ yaṃ kṣetrabhāgaṃ taṃ tam evopajīvanti // ChUp_8,1.5 //
GV05chup___u:2279: tad yatheha karmajito lokaḥ kṣīyata evam evāmutra puṇyajito lokaḥ kṣīyate /
GV05chup___u:2280: tad ya ihātmānam ananuvidya vrajanty etāṃś ca satyān kāmāṃs teṣāṃ sarveṣu lokeṣv akāmacāro bhavati /
GV05chup___u:2281: atha ya ihātmānam anivudya vrajanty etaṃś ca satyān kāmāṃs teṣāṃ sarveṣu lokeṣu kāmacāro bhavati // ChUp_8,1.6 //
GV05chup___u:2315: yo yo hy asyetaḥ praiti na tam iha darśanāya labhate // ChUp_8,3.1 //
GV05chup___u:2316: atha ye cāsyeha jīvā ye ca pretā yac cānyad icchan na labhate sarvaṃ tad atra gatvā vindate /
GV05chup___u:2317: atra hy asyaite satyāḥ kāmā anṛtāpidhānāḥ /
GV05chup___u:2318: tad yathāpi hiraṇyanidhiṃ nihitam akṣetrajñā upary upari sañcaranto na vindeyuḥ /
GV05chup___u:2319: evam evemāḥ sarvāḥ prajā ahar ahar gacchantya etaṃ brahmalokaṃ na vindanty anṛtena hi pratyūḍhāḥ // ChUp_8,3.2 //
GV05chup___u:2321: tasyaitad eva niruktaṃ hṛdy ayam iti tasmād dhṛd ayam /
GV05chup___u:2322: ahar ahar vā evaṃvit svargaṃ lokam eti // ChUp_8,3.3 //
GV05chup___u:2323: atha ya eṣa saṃprasādo 'smāc charīrāt samutthāya paraṃ jyotir upasaṃpadya svena rūpenābhiniṣpadyata eṣa ātmeti hovāca /
GV05chup___u:2325: tasya ha vā etasya brahmaṇo nāma satyam iti // ChUp_8,3.4 //
GV05chup___u:2326: atha ya ātmā sa setur dhṛtir eṣāṃ lokānām asaṃbhedāya /
GV05chup___u:2327: naitaṃ setum ahorātre tarato na jarā na mṛtyur na śoko na sukṛtam /
GV05chup___u:2330: tasmād vā etaṃ setuṃ tīrtvā andhaḥ sann anandho bhavati /
GV05chup___u:2333: tasmād vā etaṃ setuṃ tīrtvā api naktam ahar evābhiniṣpadyate /
GV05chup___u:2334: sakṛd vibhāto hy evaiṣa brahmalokaḥ // ChUp_8,4.2 //
GV05chup___u:2335: tad ya evaitaṃ brahmalokaṃ brahmacaryeṇānuvindanti teṣām evaiṣa brahmalokaḥ /
GV05chup___u:2336: teṣāṃ sarveṣu lokeṣu kāmacāro bhavati // ChUp_8,4.3 //
GV05chup___u:2337: atha yad yajña ity ācakṣate brahmacaryam eva tat /
GV05chup___u:2338: brahmacaryeṇa hy eva yo jñātā taṃ vindate /
GV05chup___u:2339: atha yad iṣṭam ity ācakṣate brahmacaryam eva tat /
GV05chup___u:2341: atha yat sattrāyaṇam ity ācakṣate brahmacaryam eva tat /
GV05chup___u:2342: brahmacaryeṇa hy eva sata ātmanas trāṇaṃ vindate /
GV05chup___u:2343: atha yan maunam ity ācakṣate brahmacaryam eva tat /
GV05chup___u:2344: brahmacaryeṇa hy evātmānam anuvidya manute // ChUp_8,5.2 //
GV05chup___u:2345: atha yad anāśakāyanam ity ācakṣate brahmacaryam eva tat /
GV05chup___u:2346: eṣa hy ātmā na naśyati yaṃ brahmacaryeṇānuvindate /
GV05chup___u:2347: atha yad araṇyāyanam ity ācakṣate brahmacaryam eva tat /
GV05chup___u:2348: tat araś ca ha vai ṇyaś cārṇavau brahmaloke tṛtīyasyām ito divi /
GV05chup___u:2351: tad aparājitā pūr brahmaṇaḥ prabhuvimitaṃ hiraṇmayam // ChUp_8,5.3 //
GV05chup___u:2352: tad ya evaitāv araṃ ca ṇyaṃ cārṇavau brahmaloke brahmacaryeṇānuvindanti teṣām evaiṣa brahmalokaḥ /
GV05chup___u:2353: teṣāṃ sarveṣu lokeṣu kāmacāro bhavati // ChUp_8,5.4 //
GV05chup___u:2354: atha yā etā hṛdayasya nāḍyas tāḥ piṅgalasyāṇimnas tiṣṭhanti śuklasya nīlasya pītasya lohitasyeti /
GV05chup___u:2355: asau vādityaḥ piṅgala eṣa śukla eṣa nīla eṣa pīta eṣa lohitaḥ // ChUp_8,6.1 //
GV05chup___u:2356: tad yathā mahāpatha ātata ubhau grāmau gacchatīmaṃ cāmuṃ caivam evaitā ādityasya raśmaya ubhau lokau gacchantīmaṃ cāmuṃ ca /
GV05chup___u:2357: amuṣmād ādityāt pratāyante tā āsu nāḍīṣu sṛptāḥ /
GV05chup___u:2358: ābhyo nāḍībhyaḥ pratāyante te 'muṣminn āditye sṛptāḥ // ChUp_8,6.2 //
GV05chup___u:2359: tad yatraitat suptaḥ samastaḥ saṃprasannaḥ svapnaṃ na vijānāti /
GV05chup___u:2362: tejasā hi tadā saṃpanno bhavati // ChUp_8,6.3 //
GV05chup___u:2364: tam abhita āsīnā āhur jānāsi māṃ jānāsi mām iti /
GV05chup___u:2365: sa yāvad asmāc charīrād anutkrānto bhavati /
GV05chup___u:2369: sa om iti vā hod vā mīyate /
GV05chup___u:2370: sa yāvat kṣipyen manas tāvad ādityaṃ gacchati /
GV05chup___u:2371: etad vai khalu lokadvāraṃ viduṣāṃ prapadanaṃ nirodho 'viduṣām // ChUp_8,6.5 //
GV05chup___u:2373: śataṃ caikā ca hṛdayasya nāḍyas tāsāṃ mūrdhānam abhiniḥsṛtaikā /
GV05chup___u:2374: tayordhvam āyann amṛtatvam eti viṣvaṅṅ anyā utkramaṇe bhavanty utkramaṇe bhavanti // ChUp_8,6.6 //
GV05chup___u:2375: ya ātmā apahatapāpmā vijaro vimṛtyur viśoko vijighatso 'pipāsaḥ satyakāmaḥ satyasaṃkalpaḥ so 'nveṣṭavyaḥ sa vijijñāsitavyaḥ /
GV05chup___u:2376: sa sarvāṃś ca lokān āpnoti sarvāṃś ca kāmān yas tam ātmānam anuvidya vijānātīti ha prajāpatir uvāca // ChUp_8,7.1 //
GV05chup___u:2378: te hocur hanta tam ātmaānam anvecchāmo yam ātmānam anviṣya sarvāṃś ca lokān āpnoti sarvāṃś ca kāmān iti /
GV05chup___u:2380: tau hāsaṃvidānāv eva samitpāṇī prajāpatisakāśam ājagmatuḥ // ChUp_8,7.2 //
GV05chup___u:2381: tau ha dvātriṃśataṃ varṣāṇi brahmacaryam ūṣatuḥ /
GV05chup___u:2384: tau hocatur ya ātmā apahatapāpmā vijaro vimṛtyur viśoko vijighatso 'pipāsaḥ satyakāmaḥ satyasaṃkalpaḥ so 'nveṣṭavyaḥ sa vijijñāsitavyaḥ /
GV05chup___u:2385: sa sarvāṃś ca lokān āpnoti sarvāṃś ca kāmān yas tam ātmānam anuvidya vijānātīti bhagavato vaco vedayante /
GV05chup___u:2387: tau ha prajāpatir uvāca ya eṣo 'kṣiṇi puruṣo dṛṣyata eṣa ātmeti hovāca /
GV05chup___u:2389: atha yo 'yaṃ bhagavo 'psu parikhyāyate yaś cāyam ādarśe katama eṣa iti /
GV05chup___u:2390: eṣa u evaiṣu sarveṣvannteṣu parikhyāyata iti hovāca // ChUp_8,7.4 //
GV05chup___u:2391: udaśarāva ātmānam avekṣya yad ātmano na vijānīthas tan me prabrūtam iti /
GV05chup___u:2393: tau ha prajāpatir uvāca kiṃ paśyatha iti /
GV05chup___u:2394: tau hocatuḥ sarvam evedam āvāṃ bhagava ātmānaṃ paśyāva ā lomabhyaḥ ā nakhebhyaḥ pratirūpam iti // ChUp_8,8.1 //
GV05chup___u:2395: tau ha prajāpatir uvāca sādhvalaṃkṛtau suvasanau pariṣkṛtau bhūtvodaśarāve 'vekṣethām iti /
GV05chup___u:2396: tau ha sādhvalaṃkṛtau suvasanau pariṣkṛtau bhūtvodaśarāve 'vekṣāṃ cakrāte /
GV05chup___u:2397: tau ha prajāpatir uvāca kiṃ paśyatha iti // ChUp_8,8.2 //
GV05chup___u:2398: tau hocatur yathaivedam āvāṃ bhagavaḥ sādhvalaṃkṛtau suvasanau pariṣkṛtau sva evam evemau bhagavaḥ sādhvallaṃkṛtau suvasanau pariṣkṛtāv iti /
GV05chup___u:2403: anupalabhyātmānam ananuvidya vrajato yatara etadupaniṣado bhaviṣyanti devā vā asurā vā te parābhaviṣyantīti /
GV05chup___u:2404: sa ha śāntahṛdaya eva virocano 'surāñ jagāma /
GV05chup___u:2405: tebhyo haitām upaniṣadaṃ provāca ātmaiveha mahayya ātmā paricaryaḥ /
GV05chup___u:2406: ātmānam eveha mahayann ātmānaṃ paricarann ubhau lokāv āpnotīmaṃ cāmuṃ ceti // ChUp_8,8.4 //
GV05chup___u:2407: tasmād apyaddyehādadānam aśraddadhānam ayajamānam āhur āsuro bateti /
GV05chup___u:2410: etena hy ammuṃ lokaṃ jeṣyanto manyante // ChUp_8,8.5 //
GV05chup___u:2411: atha hendro 'prāpyaiva devān etad bhayaṃ dadarśa /
GV05chup___u:2412_0: yathaiva khalv ayam asmiñ charīre sādhvalaṃkṛte sādhvalaṃkṛto bhavati suvasane suvasanaḥ
GV05chup___u:2412_1: pariṣkṛte pariṣkṛta evam evāyam asminn andhe 'ndho bhavati srāme srāmaḥ parivṛkṇe parivṛkṇaḥ /
GV05chup___u:2413: asyaiva śarīrasya nāśam anv eṣa naśyati /
GV05chup___u:2417: maghavan yac chāntahṛdayaḥ prāvrājīḥ sārdhaṃ virocanena kim icchan punar āgama iti /
GV05chup___u:2418_0: sa hovāca yathā eva khalvayyaṃ bhagavo 'smiñ charīre sādhvalaṃkṛte sādhvalaṃkṛto
GV05chup___u:2418_1: bhavati suvasane suvasanaḥ pariṣkṛte pariṣkṛta evam evāyam asminn andhe 'ndho bhavati
GV05chup___u:2419: asyaiva śarīrasya nāśam anv eṣa naśyati /
GV05chup___u:2426: ya eṣa svapne mahīyamānaś caraty eṣa ātmeti hovāca /
GV05chup___u:2429: sa hāprāpyaiva devān etad bhayaṃ dadarśa /
GV05chup___u:2430: tad yady apīdaṃ śarīram andhaṃ bhavaty anandhaḥ sa bhavati yadi srāmam asrāmaḥ /
GV05chup___u:2437: api roditīva nāham atra bhogyaṃ paśyāmīti // ChUp_8,10.2 //
GV05chup___u:2440: maghavan yac chāntahṛdayaḥ prāvrājīḥ kim icchan punar āgama iti /
GV05chup___u:2442: tad yady apīdaṃ bhagavaḥ śarīram andhaṃ bhavaty anandhaḥ sa bhavati yadi srāmam asrāmaḥ /
GV05chup___u:2456: tad yatraitat suptaḥ samastaḥ saṃprasannaḥ svapnaṃ na vijānātyeṣa ātmeti hovāca /
GV05chup___u:2459: sa hāprāpyaiva devān etad bhayaṃ dadarśa /
GV05chup___u:2460: nāha khalv ayam evaṃ saṃpraty ātmānaṃ jānāty ayam aham asmīti /
GV05chup___u:2465: taṃ ha prajāpatir uvāca - maghavan yac chāntahṛdayaḥ prāvrājīḥ kim icchan punar āgama iti /
GV05chup___u:2466: sa hovāca nāha khalv ayaṃ bhagava evaṃ saṃpraty ātmānaṃ jānāty ayam aham asmīti /
GV05chup___u:2477: ekaśataṃ ha vai varṣāṇi maghavān prajāpatau brahmacaryam uvāsa /
GV05chup___u:2479: maghavan martyaṃ vā idaṃ śarīram āttaṃ mṛtyunā /
GV05chup___u:2482: na vai saśarīrasya sataḥ priyāpriyayor apahatir asti /
GV05chup___u:2483: aśarīraṃ vāva santaṃ na priyāpriye spṛśataḥ // ChUp_8,12.1 //
GV05chup___u:2486: tad yathaitāny amuṣmād ākāśāt samutthāya paraṃ jyotir upasaṃpadya svena rūpeṇābhiniṣpadyante // ChUp_8,12.2 //
GV05chup___u:2487: evam evaiṣa saṃprasādo 'smāc charīrāt samutthāya paraṃ jyotir upasaṃpadya svena rūpeṇābhiniṣpadyate /
GV05chup___u:2489: sa tatra paryeti jakṣat krīḍan ramamāṇaḥ strībhir vā yānair vā jñātibhir vā nopajanaṃ smarann idaṃ śarīram /
GV05chup___u:2490: sa yathā prayogya ācaraṇe yukta evam evāyam asmiñ charīre prāṇo yuktaḥ // ChUp_8,12.3 //
GV05chup___u:2491: atha yatraitad ākāśam anuviṣaṇṇaṃ cakṣuḥ sa cākṣuṣaḥ puruṣo darśanāya cakṣuḥ /
GV05chup___u:2492: atha yo vededaṃ jighrāṇīti sa ātmā gandhāya ghrāṇam /
GV05chup___u:2493: atha yo vededam abhivyāharāṇīti sa ātmā abhivyāhārāya vāk /
GV05chup___u:2494: atha yo vededaṃ śṛṇvānīti sa ātmā śravaṇāya śrotram // ChUp_8,12.4 //
GV05chup___u:2495: atha yo vededaṃ manvānīti sa ātmā /
GV05chup___u:2497: sa vā eṣa etena daivena cakṣuṣā manasaitān kāmān paśyan ramate ya ete brahmaloke // ChUp_8,12.5 //
GV05chup___u:2498: taṃ vā etaṃ devā ātmānam upāsate /
GV05chup___u:2499: tasmāt teṣāṃ sarve ca lokā āttāḥ sarve ca kāmāḥ /
GV05chup___u:2500: sa sarvāṃś ca lokān āpnoti sarvāṃś ca kāmān yas tam ātmānam anuvidya vijānāti /
GV05chup___u:2501: iti ha prajāpatir uvāca prajāpatir uvāca // ChUp_8,12.6 //
GV05chup___u:2504: aśva iva romāṇi vidhūya pāpaṃ candra iva rāhor mukhāt pramucya dhūtvā śarīram akṛtaṃ kṛtātmā brahmalokam abhisaṃbhavāmīty abhisaṃbhavāmīti // ChUp_8,13.1 //
GV05chup___u:2506: te yadantarā tad brahma tad amṛtaṃ sa ātmā /
GV05chup___u:2507: prajāpateḥ sabhāṃ veśma prapadye yaśo 'haṃ bhavāmi brāhmaṇānāṃ yaśo rājñām yaśo viśām /
GV05chup___u:2510: śyetam adatkam adatkaṃ śyetaṃ lindu mābhigāṃ lindu mābhigām // ChUp_8,14.1 //
GV05chup___u:2511: tad dhaitad brahmā prajāpataya uvāca prajāpatir manave manuḥ prajābhyaḥ /
GV05chup___u:2512_0: ācāryakulād vedam adhītya yathāvidhānaṃ guroḥ karmātiśeṣeṇābhisamāvṛtya kuṭumbe śucau
GV05chup___u:2512_1: deśe svādhyāyam adhīyāno dharmikān vidadhad ātmani sarvendriyāṇi saṃpratiṣṭhāpyāhiṃsan
GV05chup___u:2513: sa khalv evaṃ vartayan yāvad āyuṣaṃ brahmalokam abhisaṃpadyate /
GV05chup___u:2514: na ca punar āvartate na ca punar āvartate // ChUp_8,15.1 //
